recipe: Heat margarine over medium heat in a skillet. Cook and stir onion and garlic in the hot skillet until tender, 3 to 4 minutes. Add eggs, 1/4 cup salsa, and cumin; scramble until set, 3 to 4 minutes. Stir in Cheddar cheese.
Spoon eggs evenly into tortillas; fold and top with remaining 1/4 cup salsa.
